config.sql000: SELECT CASE WHEN C.SCODE IS NULL THEN '' ELSE '' END AS gsbm, CASE WHEN C.SCODE IS NULL THEN B.SCODE ELSE C.SCODE END AS SCODE, CASE WHEN C.scode is NOT NULL THEN '' ELSE B.sname END sname ,(CASE WHEN C.SNAME IS NULL THEN 'SH' ELSE C.SNAME END) AS YHZHMC,B.SCODE AS PID,FACT_A AS HBZJ,FACT_B AS YHCK,FACT_C AS JZJE, CASE WHEN(NVL(FACT_B,0)+NVL(FACT_C,0))=0 THEN 0 ELSE (NVL(FACT_C,0)/(NVL(FACT_B,0)+NVL(FACT_C,0))) END AS JZD FROM DW_FACTCAPITALDETAIL A INNER JOIN DW_DIMCOMPANY B ON A.DIM_COMPANY=B.SCODE AND DIM_PERIOD=:period LEFT JOIN DW_DIMBANK C ON A.DIM_ACCOUNTBANKS=C.SCODE WHERE B.SCODE IN (SELECT SCODE FROM DW_DIMCOMPANY WHERE (SCODE=:company OR SPCODE LIKE :company||'%') AND CISDEL = 'N' AND CTYPE='1') AND B.SCODE NOT IN (SELECT SCODE FROM DW_DIMCOMPANY WHERE CTYPE='0') ORDER BY B.SCODE,DIM_ACCOUNTBANKS DESC
config.sql: WITH companytab AS ( SELECT CONNECT_BY_ROOT scode AS pid, t.*, connect_by_isleaf AS cisleaf FROM DW_DIMCOMPANY t WHERE CISDEL = 'N' AND STYPE = '1' START WITH scode = :company CONNECT BY PRIOR scode = spcode ),  tt AS ( SELECT CASE  WHEN B.SCODE IS NULL THEN A.dim_company ELSE B.SCODE END AS gsbm , CASE  WHEN B.SCODE IS NULL THEN A.dim_company ELSE B.SCODE END AS scode , CASE  WHEN B.scode IS NOT NULL THEN B.sname ELSE A.dim_company END AS sname , CASE  WHEN C.SNAME IS NOT NULL THEN C.SNAME ELSE A.DIM_BANKNAME END AS YHZHMC , CASE  WHEN B.PID IS NULL THEN '' ELSE B.PID END AS PID, FACT_A AS HBZJ, FACT_B AS YHCK, FACT_C AS JZJE , CASE  WHEN nvl(FACT_B, 0) + nvl(FACT_C, 0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE round(nvl(FACT_C, 0) / (nvl(FACT_B, 0) + nvl(FACT_C, 0)) * 100, 4) END AS JZD FROM DW_FACTCAPITALDETAIL A RIGHT JOIN companytab B ON A.DIM_COMPANY = B.SCODE AND DIM_PERIOD = :period LEFT JOIN DW_DIMACCOUNTBANKS C ON A.DIM_ACCOUNTBANKS = C.SCODE ) SELECT GSBM, SCODE, SNAME, YHZHMC, PID , SUM(HBZJ) AS HBZJ, SUM(YHCK) AS YHCK , SUM(JZJE) AS JZJE, SUM(JZD) AS JZD FROM tt GROUP BY GSBM, SCODE, SNAME, YHZHMC, PID ORDER BY decode(pid, '', gsbm, pid), GSBM

with tt as( SELECT CASE WHEN C.SCODE IS NULL THEN B.scode ELSE C.SCODE END AS gsbm, CASE WHEN C.SCODE IS NULL AND B.SNAME IS NOT NULL THEN B.SCODE ELSE '' END AS scode, CASE WHEN C.scode IS NOT NULL THEN '' ELSE B.sname END sname , CASE WHEN C.SNAME IS NOT NULL THEN C.SNAME ELSE A.DIM_ACCOUNTBANKS END YHZHMC, ( CASE WHEN C.SNAME IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE B.SCODE END) AS PID, FACT_A AS HBZJ, FACT_B AS YHCK, FACT_C AS JZJE, CASE WHEN(NVL(FACT_B,0)+NVL(FACT_C,0))=0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((NVL(FACT_C,0)/(NVL(FACT_B,0)+NVL(FACT_C,0))*100),4) END AS JZD FROM DW_FACTCAPITALDETAIL A INNER JOIN DW_DIMCOMPANY B ON A.DIM_COMPANY=B.SCODE AND DIM_PERIOD=:period LEFT JOIN DW_DIMACCOUNTBANKS C ON A.DIM_ACCOUNTBANKS=C.SCODE WHERE B.SCODE IN ( SELECT SCODE FROM DW_DIMCOMPANY WHERE ( SCODE=:company OR SPCODE LIKE :company||'%') AND CISDEL = 'N' AND STYPE='1') AND B.SCODE NOT IN ( SELECT SCODE FROM DW_DIMCOMPANY WHERE STYPE='0')) SELECT GSBM,SCODE,SNAME,YHZHMC,PID,SUM(HBZJ) HBZJ,SUM(YHCK) YHCK,SUM(JZJE) JZJE,SUM(JZD) JZD FROM( select GSBM,SCODE,SNAME,YHZHMC,PID,HBZJ,YHCK,JZJE,JZD from tt union all SELECT SCODE,SCODE,SNAME,'SH' AS YHZHMC,'' PID,0 HBZJ,0 YHCK,0 JZJE,0 JZD FROM DW_DIMCOMPANY WHERE ( SCODE=:company OR SPCODE LIKE :company||'%') AND CISDEL = 'N' AND STYPE='1' ) GROUP BY GSBM,SCODE,SNAME,YHZHMC,PID ORDER BY decode(pid,'',gsbm,pid),GSBM

WITH tt AS( SELECT CASE WHEN C.SCODE IS NULL THEN B.scode ELSE C.SCODE END AS gsbm, CASE WHEN C.SCODE IS NULL AND B.SNAME IS NOT NULL THEN B.SCODE ELSE '' END AS scode, CASE WHEN C.scode IS NOT NULL THEN '' ELSE B.sname END sname , CASE WHEN C.SNAME IS NOT NULL THEN C.SNAME ELSE A.DIM_ACCOUNTBANKS END YHZHMC, ( CASE WHEN C.SNAME IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE B.SCODE END) AS PID, FACT_A AS HBZJ, FACT_B AS YHCK, FACT_C AS JZJE, CASE WHEN(NVL(FACT_B,0)+NVL(FACT_C,0))=0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((NVL(FACT_C,0)/(NVL(FACT_B,0)+NVL(FACT_C,0))*100),4) END AS JZD, sdesc FROM DW_FACTCAPITALDETAIL A INNER JOIN DW_DIMCOMPANY B ON A.DIM_COMPANY=B.SCODE AND DIM_PERIOD=:period LEFT JOIN DW_DIMACCOUNTBANKS C ON A.DIM_ACCOUNTBANKS=C.SCODE WHERE B.SCODE IN ( SELECT SCODE FROM DW_DIMCOMPANY WHERE ( SCODE=:company OR SPCODE LIKE :company||'%') AND CISDEL = 'N' AND STYPE='1') AND B.SCODE NOT IN ( SELECT SCODE FROM DW_DIMCOMPANY WHERE STYPE='0')) SELECT GSBM, SCODE, SNAME, YHZHMC, PID, SUM(HBZJ) HBZJ, SUM(YHCK) YHCK, SUM(JZJE) JZJE, SUM(JZD) JZD, sdesc as yy FROM ( SELECT GSBM, SCODE, SNAME, YHZHMC, PID, HBZJ, YHCK, JZJE, JZD, sdesc FROM tt UNION ALL SELECT SCODE, SCODE, SNAME, 'SH' AS YHZHMC, '' PID, 0 HBZJ, 0 YHCK, 0 JZJE, 0 JZD, '' sdesc FROM DW_DIMCOMPANY WHERE ( SCODE=:company OR SPCODE LIKE :company||'%') AND CISDEL = 'N' AND STYPE='1' ) GROUP BY GSBM, SCODE, SNAME, YHZHMC, PID, sdesc ORDER BY DECODE(pid,'',gsbm,pid), GSBM
